name: BattleZ!
description:
Note YOU HAVE TO HAVE STEAM INSTALLED TO PLAY THIS GAME

ONCE YOU DOWNLOAD THE GAME  OPEN UP STEAM BROWSE AND SEARCH FOR BattleZ! floder. add game to STEAM and start PLaying.

Hi 

Battle Z!

Compete with oter place 

Multiplayer Game 

 login with  Steam to play

If you have steam instaled(Login to Steam) You will see Steam Logo on right bottom of the Game.

Or press Shift+tab

Extract files to your Desired Folder

Open file

 

Click On Z! If game doesnot start click on

Inside BattleRoyalCell clck on

Click Binaries 

In Binaries we Have  Win 64

Lastly You can click on BattleZ! wait for few minutes for game to begin

OPEN STEAM

WHEN YOU CLICK ON ADD A GAME IN LEFT BOTOM CORNER               CLICK ON    ................ADD A NON-STEAM GAME...............

AGAIN SELECT BROWSE AND SELECT BattleZ! from the folder you have saved in you PC.

Wait for players........................
